channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Decentralized AI Is Watching — And Understanding — Everything
item.description: Bittensor subnet Score turns low-res sports footage into real-time intelligence, powering bets, scouting and AI predictions across industries.

item.title: NOAA Predicts Active Hurricane Season, How Does Social Media Fit In
item.description: Social media has proven helpful in the past in disseminating critical safety information while serving as a communication link following a storm.

item.title: Huawei’s New Earbuds Offer Active Noise Cancellation Despite Open Ear Design
item.description: The FreeBuds 6 continue the tech giant’s strong push into audio products.

item.title: Forget iPhone 17 Air: New Leak Says 2027 Model Will Have Upgrade Worth Waiting For
item.description: The most anticipated iPhone 17 model will be upgraded in 2027, it’s claimed, with a key new benefit.
